name: claude-api-cli
description: Claude Code API Service CLI management. Use when user wants to manage the API service (start/stop/check status), create/manage API keys, test endpoints, or check service health. Commands: service (start/stop/restart/status), health (check/deps/ping), keys (create/list/revoke/permissions), test (completion/task/agents/skills/all).
author: Claude Code Orchestrator

user_interface.invocation: Read SKILL.md for command reference, then execute CLI commands directly
